title: Video Reflection Process for Enhancing Language Proficiency Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language communication skills
context.additional_context: Blended operation where learners complete pre-learning using mobile devices before participating in classroom discussions and practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can pre-view over 90% of 10-minute video lectures provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can achieve over 80% participation in language practice tasks through collaboration with peers.
Learners can analyze their language learning process through video reflection and propose three or more improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
